name: Light Spirits
text: Sigh You're still here? ... Why do you keep persisting, Mortal./nThou as much as I would like to be your friend./nYour presence in the mortal realm is required./nMaybe we should postpone our friendship.../nand strengthen your soul by keeping it safe in a g&soul g&lantern./nSo...why don't you g&craft one, Mortal./nBut...you don't have to hurry...
